comments.raw_text: This bug tracks work to implement ECMAScript Harmony in SpiderMonkey. Presently, that means the "Draft Specification for ES.next (Ecma-262 Edition 6)".
comments.creator: dmandelin@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
Morphing to cover only ES6, as things are already being actively deferred to ES7.  Someone should file a new metabug for those things.

But mostly I just want the bug alias I always try, that never works.  :-)
comments.creator: jwalden@mit.edu
